// 1
// if (A â€“ B) > 3

100011_00000_01001_0000000000000000		// [0] lw $t1 0($zero)
100011_00000_01010_0000000000000001		// [1] lw $t2 1($zero)
000000_01010_01001_01001_00000_100010 	// [2] sub $t1, $t1, $t2
001000_00000_01011_0000000000000011 	// [3] addi $t3, $zero, 0x3
000000_01011_01001_01010_00000_101010 	// [4] slt $t2, $t3, $t1
000101_01010_00000_0000000000110000 	// [5] bne $t2, $zero, DO ->adrx 48

// 3
// C = C << 5;
// *dPtr = 7;

100011_00000_01001_0000000000000010 	// [6] lw $t1, 2($zero)
000000_00000_01001_01001_00101_000000 	// [7] sll $t1, $t1, 5
101011_00000_01001_0000000000000010 	// [8] sw $t1, 2($zero)

001000_00000_01100_0000000000000111 	// [9] addi $t4, $zero, 0x7
101011_00000_01100_0000000000000011 	// [10] sw $t4, 3($zero)

000010_00000000000000000001000100 		// [11] j END -> adrx 68

// 2
// C = 6;
// D = D << 2

// [0x00400030] DO:

001000_00000_01100_0000000000000110		// [12] addi $t4, $zero, 0x6
101011_00000_01100_0000000000000010 	// [13] sw $t4, 2($zero)

100011_00000_01001_0000000000000011 	// [14] lw $t1, 3($zero)
000000_00000_01001_01001_00010_000000 	// [15] sll $t1, $t1, 2
101011_00000_01001_0000000000000011 	// [16] sw $t1, 3($zero)

// [0x00400044] END:
